title: MLab/PESIL interview help
content:
Hi,

I'm a CS student in the second sem and I've gotten through the written round for the PES Innovation Lab summer internship. I was just wondering if someone could give me any advice on the interview. What sort of questions do they ask? What should I do to make me seem like a good fit?

Any advice would be appreciated!

comments.body: A bunch of my friends have been interning and leading projects there for a long time now. I can connect them to you if you would like. Just DM me or start a chat.
